[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/node/local_testnet/processors.rs] [Resource: Memory allocation] [Memory Leak] The ProcessorManager stores IndexerProcessorConfig which may contain large data structures - if processors fail to start, are these configs properly deallocated, or can repeated startup failures cause memory exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/node/local_testnet/processors.rs] [Resource: Blocking thread pool] [Thread Starvation] The run_migrations uses spawn_blocking with no timeout - if migrations hang on a database lock, does this permanently consume a blocking thread, and can multiple hanging migrations exhaust the thread pool causing system-wide blocking operation failure? (High)
